pageContext.claim: “Our tax and regulatory reforms are stopping the outsourcing of jobs, where they outsource all your jobs to other countries, and keeping businesses in America where they belong.”
pageContext.analysis: Research from Good Jobs Nation found the rate of “offshoring” to exceed the rate under the Obama administration. But that's only part of the picture, as The Fact Checker previously noted data from the Reshoring Initiative shows that companies started to return jobs to the United States — or other countries invested in the United States — during the Obama administration, but the trend really started to pick up in 2017.
